text:
Created attachment 30715
example of problem with new lines

POI-45558 raised the issue of text extraction from text boxes.  This was fixed as of 3.9, but a new line is now incorrectly inserted between runs in the test doc that was submitted in POI-45558.  I'm attaching a doc from POI-45558.  Unless someone else wants to take this, I should have a patch and unit tests shortly.

Many thanks to grizolle.benedicte for the original issue, test docs and unit tests with 45558.
creator: tallison@mitre.org
